attributes.action: Ban the Unauthorised use of Mosquito Boxes
attributes.additional_details: Ban the everyday use of Mosquito Boxes due to infringing the civil liberties of everyone one with sensitive hearing including children, adolescents, young adults and more. It is unfair and unjustifiable for them to be used for the prevention of people especially children and young adults congregating in a public place, it is an infringement of civil liberties. There is no need for them to be used down public streets out of prejudice opposed to a true purpose.
